DOC.brief_summary: A no-cost intervention may improve adherence recommendation higher-quality , lower-cost care patient critical illness endorse collaborative critical care society . The investigator propose prompt consideration functional outcome . This trial help establish impact intervention practice pattern include proxy engagement element share decision-making .
DOC.criteria: Licensed physician At least 4 week clinical work I.C.U . U.S.A. past 12 month < 25 year old NonEnglish speaking Primarily practice medicine outside U.S.A .
